definition: of or relating to or belonging to mammals of the order Artiodactyla, placental mammal having hooves with an even number of functional toes on each foot
details:
adjective
- of or relating to or belonging to mammals of the order Artiodactyla
= synonyms: artiodactylous, even-toed
noun
- placental mammal having hooves with an even number of functional toes on each foot
= synonyms: even-toed ungulate, artiodactyl mammal
